title: PMD says salary cut letter is FAKE
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The President’s Media Division announced that the information shared on social media using the PMD letterhead stating that the salary for the month of May of Government servants who join Friday’s Hartal will be slashed, is FALSE.
The PMD further said that an investigation is underway over the post circulating on social media.
